name: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 1
name_original: The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 1
description:
The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 1 is an adventure game developed by KING Art. It came out on 23-07-2013. It was published by The Adventure Company. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
The Raven: Legacy of a Master Thief - Episode 1 is available on PC and PlayStation 3.
